Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

name.en: Chair of Security and Theoretical Computer Science

structural_unit_name.en: Chair of Security and Theoretical Computer Science

description.en: Web application security concepts, common vulnerabilities according to OWASP, fixing and exploiting web application vulnerabilities
description.et: Veebirakenduste turvakontseptsioonid, tavalised OWASP -i turvaaugud, veebirakenduste turvaaukude parandamine ja ekspluateerimine

objectives.en: Students taking the course will gain an understanding of web application security criteria in the light of OWASP.
objectives.et: Õpilased mõistavad veebirakenduste turvakriteeriume OWASP valguses.

learning_outcomes.en: Students will learn the fundamentals of web application security. They get practical experience for secure web application development.
learning_outcomes.et: Õpilased õpivad veebirakenduste turvalisuse põhitõdesid. Nad saavad praktilisi kogemusi veebirakenduste turvaliseks arendamiseks.

independent_work.et: The list of independent work will be given in the lectures.

grade_evaluation.et: The final grade will be determined by the home exercises (70%) and the test (30%).

debt_elimination.et: The test is optional and cannot be retaken. If a student fails to appear on the test and receives F for the course, the student can take the test in another semester when the course is given.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

name.en: Chair of Security and Theoretical Computer Science
Chair of Security and Theoretical Computer Science
